text: Henk van Mierlo (1957 â€“ July 2024) was a Dutch motocross racer. During the 1980s Van Mierlo was a member of the Venko Honda team. He won many races, among others the International Six Days Enduro in 1984. During a training in 1991, Van Mierlo crashed and broke his neck and suffered a spinal cord injury. He was forced to live rest of his life in a wheelchair. He continued to follow motocross for the rest of his life. Van Mierlo died in July 2024, at the age of 66. ==References== Category:Dutch motorcycle racers Category:1957 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Eindhoven Category:Place of death missing
title: Henk van Mierlo
